Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Gen AI might give you an accurate answer where a teacher might not be able to. yet we follow teacher's guidance as he/she will grade us so tough gen AI is correct we are bound to follow the feedback of a teacher just in order to get good grades

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
